ModMetaData.name: GeneticRim
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Extract DNA from animals and hybridize them to create new, exotic species!
<size=24>Features</size> - Extract genes from Bears, Chickens, Boomalopes, Muffalos and Wolves, and create hybrids of these species. - A bearalope is different from a boombear, so there are 25 new species to experiment with (plus 5 from Thrumbos!). Some very useful, some... less so. - Once you research the advanced genetic engineering tech, you can also extract genes from Thrumbos and hybridize them!
<size=24>Issues</size> Some of the biggest animals might flicker. This is to be expected, since a few of them are bigger than Thrumbos!
<size=24>Notes</size> How do I progress? Here is a mini-guide: - First, research the tech. - Build a Pulper to get organic pulp from wood, and a Genetic Extraction Table to get DNA from animals and to build empty incubators. - Kill the animals to extract their genes. - Build the Gene Pod to mix the genes of different animals, and fill an empty incubator with the mixture. - The incubator will hatch in a day. Keep it warm! You will need to tame the creature afterwards, of course. - Results are random! If you mix Bear and Chicken, you might get a Bearchicken or a Chickenbear. Or the experiment can also go wrong... - Finally, research the advanced tech, build the Advanced Gene Pod and experiment with Thrumbos to get the strongest creatures in the game.
<size=24>Plans for the future</size> I have many combinations in mind, so if people seem to enjoy this I'd be happy to add them :)
